meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Heins Philis Curlender Gary Harvey Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1355.

td.p: Bill Heins, a graduate student originally from Whiting, Iowa
Philis Curlender, a homemaker from Los Angeles, California
Gary Harvey, an accounts payable supervisor originally from Baltimore, Maryland

tr.td: 20TH CENTURY PERSONALITIES
[The TH was uppercase and about 5/6ths the size of the 20.]
BEER
GEOGRAPHY
CHILDREN'S LITERATURE
MUSEUMS
"OF" SONGS

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Philis: Who is Stalin?)

Svetlana Stalin

Philis
')
